body:

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
In my opinion! I would leave the *.ps1 extension and rather use the '#requires -Version X' statement so I can at least provide some useful cross-platform scripting.  But, it only works in script file.  I would love this statement with the '-Version' to work in modules.

At the same time, we can always figured out other ways to make it work.

:)

comments.author: be5invis
comments.body:
@iSazonov It is not a duplicate.
The main issue is about installing Two versions side-by-side, so that we can finally confidently introduce breaking changes. For scripts, `#REQUIRING` or changing extension would be both fine to distinct "Old" and "New" scripts.
